attributes.action: Change the currently laws which exclude home educated children from free access to G.C.S.E's.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that the government is failing home educated children by not allowing them free and easy access to G.C.S.E's, unless they attend full time government run establishments. This is denying a vast amount of home educated children their basic right to education and qualifications. We feel home educated children should be allowed to sit exams and have course work verified free of charge, like other children who attend school. We feel that forcing parents to pay for these exams is socially desciminating home educated children from the work place and higher education.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Change the currently laws which exclude home educated children from free access to G.C.S.E's."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16563

Prime Minister's Office
